The WiFi Experience score is an aggregate percentage meant to measure and contextualize how well client connections meet optimal wireless experience indicators related to data transfer, latency, disconnection frequency, and more. These indicators are established using Ubiquiti analytics and app vendor recommendations.

font-family:sans-serif; margin: 0; padding: 0; } div.voucher { display: inline-block; border: 1px dashed #000; width: 166px; height: 100px; float: left; page-break-inside: avoid; } div.voucher div.voucher-outerWrapper { display: table; width: 100%%; height: 100%%; } div.voucher div.voucher-innerWrapper { display: table-cell; width: 100%%; height: 100%%; text-align: center; vertical-align: middle; overflow: hidden; } div.limit { font-size: 0.5em; } div.limit div { float: left; width: 100%%; } div.limit.downrate_enabled .downrate_enabled, div.limit.uprate_enabled .uprate_enabled, div.limit.quota_enabled .quota_enabled { display: inline-block; } div.limit.downrate_enabled .downrate_disabled, div.limit.uprate_enabled .uprate_disabled, div.limit.quota_enabled .quota_disabled { display: none; } div.limit.downrate_disabled .downrate_enabled, div.limit.uprate_disabled .uprate_enabled, div.limit.quota_disabled .quota_enabled { display: none; } div.limit.downrate_disabled .downrate_disabled, div.limit.uprate_disabled .uprate_disabled, div.limit.quota_disabled .quota_disabled { display: inline-block; } div.limit div div.heading { display: inline-block; width: 83px; text-align: right; } div.limit div div.value { display: inline-block; width: 78px; text-align: left; margin-left: 5px; white-space: nowrap; } div.valid { text-decoration:underline; color: #666666; } div.valid div { display: inline-block; } div.valid.days_enabled .days_enabled, div.valid.hours_enabled .hours_enabled, div.valid.minutes_enabled .minutes_enabled { display: inline-block; } div.valid.days_disabled .days_enabled, div.valid.hours_disabled .hours_enabled, div.valid.minutes_disabled .minutes_enabled { display: none; } div.code { font-weight:bold; padding-top: 5px; padding-bottom: 5px; font-size:larger; } </style> </head> <body>%1$s</body> </html> "

DHCP guarding configures UniFi switches to restrict DHCP servers on this network to the IP(s) specified here. All other IPs attempting to serve DHCP will have the DHCP responses blocked, and an alert will be generated in the UniFi Network application.
